::Battera/Feline::

Battera::
she walked into the lab looking for CyberShark.  She saw Unitron 
there. "You seen Cybershark?  Zardus just called us to battle. What 
to come along and join in on the fun?"



Feline::
She smiled at the thought of a good fight.  She wasn't much of a 
fighter, but then again, Zardus called and she wanted Zardus to be 
proud of her.  She walked down the hall and opened her link to 
Zardus, What's your position?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus' looks down at his wrist comp as it beeps, his eyes widening 
when he 
> sees that the forest around them is almost filled with bots 
(Deemos' group). 
> He swears, activating his comm-link.
> 
> "Lavacons, Gotron, Bloodystrike," he says nto it, "Return to base. 
There is a 
> battle brewing."
> 
> He opens a channel to the rest of the Alliance members. "Everyone, 
prepare 
> for battle. A group is on their way."
> 
> Zardus turns to look at the forest, his hand near his plasma 
launcher.
